summary: The Architecture Improvement Proposal outlines a shift to per-file AI code reviews, addressing scalability and quality limitations of the current system.

issues.title: Unclear Code Comment
issues.message: The code comment regarding model optimization lacks detail on how per-file reviews achieve consistency standards.

positive_feedback: Good use of AI to improve code review process with clear benefits in performance and scalability.
Well-detailed proposal with clear implementation phases and expected outcomes described.
Explicit separation of different models for specific file types, enhancing both cost-effectiveness and review precision.
